Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties of various print classes against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property of <font face="courier new">PrintPageEventArgs</font> class indicates the settings of the current page.
This property of <font face="courier new">PrintPageEventArgs</font> class indicates additional page to be printed.
This property of <font face="courier new">PrintPreviewControl</font> class indicates the upper-left page.
This property of <font face="courier new">PrintPreviewControl</font> class indicates the pages displayed horizontally.
This property of <font face="courier new">PrintDocument</font> class identifies the printer to print the document.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(3), (B)-(5), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(4).
